text: Welcome to the AudioPipeline demonstration! This system converts text to speech with professional-quality output.
Each audio file is enhanced with ambient background sounds like city noise, rain, or coffee shop ambiance.
The background audio is automatically balanced to be quieter than the speech, ensuring clear communication.
You can process multiple JSON files at once, customize background volume, or disable background audio entirely.
This technology is perfect for creating engaging podcasts, audiobooks, or any content that benefits from ambient soundscapes.
The system gracefully handles API failures and missing dependencies with automatic fallbacks to ensure reliable operation.
Thank you for exploring the AudioPipeline! Enjoy the rich, professional-quality audio output with ambient backgrounds.
